Project Intrex: A General Review .A Overhage, Carl F. J. Reintjes, J. Francis A comprehensive review of the experimental information storage and retrieval system developed by Project Intrex is presented, together with a description of major results and conclusions that were derived through use of the system.. Salient features of the Intrex system included an argumented catalog stored in an online interactive computer in combination with full-text storage on microfiche.. Guaranteed access to full text at remote allocations was provided through use of an automatic fiche storage and retrieval system that was computer-controlled.. Discussed in the paper are the details of the catalog structure, user experiments, economic studies and information-system networking.. .X 10	1	534 18	1	534 124	1	534 127	2	534 129	1	534 145	1	534 190	2	534 191	1	534 197	1	534 211	1	534 214	1	534 218	1	534 225	1	534 243	1	534 244	1	534 304	1	534 305	1	534 306	1	534 307	1	534 330	1	534 332	1	534 357	1	534 358	1	534 376	1	534 378	1	534 385	1	534 394	1	534 433	1	534 434	1	534 450	1	534 451	1	534 452	1	534 459	3	534 468	1	534 484	2	534 492	1	534 508	2	534 511	1	534 512	1	534 514	1	534 518	1	534 520	1	534 523	2	534 524	2	534 525	2	534 526	2	534 527	1	534 528	1	534 529	2	534 530	2	534 534	5	534 546	2	534 553	1	534 579	2	534 594	2	534 603	1	534 604	1	534 606	2	534 609	1	534 610	1	534 611	1	534 612	1	534 625	1	534 626	2	534 630	1	534 633	1	534 635	1	534 636	2	534 637	3	534 639	1	534 642	2	534 648	1	534 650	1	534 692	1	534 696	1	534 699	1	534 702	2	534 703	2	534 705	1	534 708	1	534 726	1	534 727	1	534 728	1	534 730	1	534 731	2	534 732	3	534 733	2	534 734	2	534 736	2	534 738	1	534 739	1	534 740	1	534 741	1	534 742	1	534 743	1	534 744	1	534 755	1	534 817	1	534 820	2	534 823	1	534 825	1	534 826	4	534 827	3	534 828	1	534 830	1	534 877	1	534 879	2	534 883	1	534 947	2	534 948	1	534 1004	1	534 1017	1	534 1035	1	534 1058	1	534 1078	1	534 1089	1	534 1091	1	534 1146	1	534 1207	1	534 1230	1	534 1257	1	534 1264	1	534 1297	1	534 1303	1	534 1356	1	534 1364	1	534 1368	1	534 1370	2	534 1372	2	534 1373	1	534 1374	3	534 1375	1	534 1376	1	534 1377	1	534 1383	1	534 1390	1	534 1396	1	534 1427	1	534 1441	1	534 1441	1	534
